casename: PT Hutan Domas Raya v Yue Xiu Enterprises (Holdings) Limited and Another
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; L P Thean JA
counsel: Dr Lai Tze Chang Stanley and Koh Oi Leen Melissa (Lee & Lee) for the appellants; Koh Kok Wah and Chua Ju Lee Felicia (Wong & Leow) for the respondents
tags-parsed: Conflict of Laws/Natural forum/Stay of proceedings/Applicable principles- Whether plaintiff having a personal or juridical advantage in Singapore a decisive factor- Whether prospect of conflicting decisions in different jurisdictions decisive- Question of convenience and expense
